game_name: XR MANGA FIST OF THE NORTHSTAR【The First Edition】Volume 1-6 Set
game_description: The immortal masterpiece "Fist of the North Star", which has enthusiastic fans all over the world, is now available as the first installment of the XR Manga series! You can read "Fist of the North Star" like never before in a VR space that perfectly reproduces the world view. You can also enjoy the rhythm game "I am Kenshiro" where you can become Kenshiro yourself, and "VR Figure" where you can play with Kenshiro as a VR figure.
